name: .HOSTNAMES File Extension
summary: Learn about .HOSTNAMES files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A HOSTNAMES file is a plain text file that contains a list of hostnames associated with a multi-hostname website. HOSTNAMES files are created by the Archive Team when archiving the content stored on a multi-hostname site.

content: The Archive Team is a team of volunteers dedicated to preserving Internet content that might otherwise be deleted. As part of their website archiving process, the Archive Team often uses a script to catalog all the hostnames associated with a multi-hostname website. This script generates a HOSTNAMES file.

Each HOSTNAMES file contains a list of serial numbers paired with a list of the hostnames associated with a website. The file is then used in a later step of the archiving process to retrieve the data stored at each hostname.

instructions: You can open a HOSTNAMES file and view the list of hostnames it contains in any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad or Apple TextEdit.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
